moves.description: The user charges at the target using every bit of its power. The user must rest on the next turn.

moves.name: Sing
moves.description: A soothing lullaby is sung in a calming voice that puts the target into a deep slumber.

moves.name: Growl
moves.description: The user growls in an endearing way, making the opposing team less wary. The foes' Attack stats are lowered.

moves.name: Water Gun
moves.description: The target is blasted with a forceful shot of water.

moves.name: Mist
moves.description: The user cloaks its body with a white mist that prevents any of its stats from being cut for five turns.

moves.name: Confuse Ray
moves.description: The target is exposed to a sinister ray that triggers confusion.

moves.description: The user flash freezes chunks of ice and hurls them at the target. This move always goes first.

moves.name: Water Pulse
moves.description: The user attacks the target with a pulsing blast of water. It may also confuse the target.

moves.name: Body Slam
moves.description: The user drops onto the target with its full body weight. It may also leave the target with paralysis.

moves.name: Rain Dance
moves.description: The user summons a heavy rain that falls for five turns, powering up Water-type moves.

moves.name: Perish Song
moves.description: Any Pokémon that hears this song faints in three turns, unless it switches out of battle.

moves.name: Ice Beam
moves.description: The target is struck with an icy-cold beam of energy. It may also freeze the target solid.

moves.name: Brine
moves.description: If the target's HP is down to about half, this attack will hit with double the power.

moves.name: Safeguard
moves.description: The user creates a protective field that prevents status problems for five turns.

moves.name: Hydro Pump
moves.description: The target is blasted by a huge volume of water launched under great pressure.

moves.name: Sheer Cold
moves.description: The target is attacked with a blast of absolute-zero cold. The target instantly faints if it hits.

moves.name: Helping Hand
moves.description: The user assists an ally by boosting the power of its attack.

moves.name: Tackle
moves.description: A physical attack in which the user charges and slams into the target with its whole body.

moves.name: Tail Whip
moves.description: The user wags its tail cutely, making opposing Pokémon less wary and lowering their Defense stat.

moves.name: Sand Attack
moves.description: Sand is hurled in the target's face, reducing its accuracy.

moves.name: Thunder Shock
moves.description: A jolt of electricity is hurled at the target to inflict damage. It may also leave the target with paralysis.

moves.name: Quick Attack
moves.description: The user lunges at the target at a speed that makes it almost invisible. It is sure to strike first.

moves.name: Double Kick
moves.description: The target is quickly kicked twice in succession using both feet.

moves.name: Thunder Fang
moves.description: The user bites with electrified fangs. It may also make the target flinch or leave it with paralysis.

moves.name: Pin Missile

moves.name: Thunder

moves.name: Constrict

moves.name: Vine Whip

moves.name: Signal Beam

moves.name: Tackle
moves.description: A physical attack in which the user charges and slams into the target with its whole body.

moves.name: Protect

moves.description: The user attacks everything around it by causing an explosion. The user faints upon using this move.

moves.name: Bide

moves.name: Spikes

moves.name: Payback

moves.name: Double-Edge

moves.name: Harden

moves.name: Knock Off

moves.description: The user emits a healing pulse which restores the target's HP by up to half of its max HP.

moves.name: Egg Bomb
moves.description: A large egg is hurled at the target with maximum force to inflict damage.

moves.name: Light Screen
moves.description: A wondrous wall of light is put up to suppress damage from special attacks for five turns.

moves.name: Healing Wish
moves.description: The user faints. In return, the Pokémon taking its place will have its HP restored and status cured.

moves.name: Double-Edge
moves.description: A reckless, life-risking tackle. It also damages the user by a fairly large amount, however.

moves.name: Scratch
moves.description: Hard, pointed, and sharp claws rake the target to inflict damage.

moves.name: Harden
moves.description: The user stiffens all the muscles in its body to raise its Defense stat.

moves.name: Leech Life
moves.description: The user drains the target's blood. The user's HP is restored by half the damage taken by the target.

moves.name: Sand Attack
moves.description: Sand is hurled in the target's face, reducing its accuracy.

moves.name: Fury Swipes
moves.description: The target is raked with sharp claws or scythes for two to five times in quick succession.

moves.name: Mind Reader
moves.description: The user senses the target's movements with its mind to ensure its next attack does not miss the target.

moves.name: False Swipe
moves.description: A restrained attack that prevents the target from fainting. The target is left with at least 1 HP.

moves.name: Mud-Slap
moves.description: The user hurls mud in the target's face to inflict damage and lower its accuracy.

moves.name: Metal Claw
moves.description: The target is raked with steel claws. It may also raise the user's Attack stat.

moves.name: Dig
moves.description: The user burrows, then attacks on the second turn. It can also be used to exit dungeons.

moves.name: Growl
moves.description: The user growls in an endearing way, making the opposing team less wary. The foes' Attack stats are lowered.

moves.name: Water Gun
moves.description: The target is blasted with a forceful shot of water.

moves.name: Supersonic
moves.description: The user generates odd sound waves from its body. It may confuse the target.

moves.name: Wing Attack
moves.description: The target is struck with large, imposing wings spread wide to inflict damage.

moves.name: Mist
moves.description: The user cloaks its body with a white mist that prevents any of its stats from being cut for five turns.

moves.name: Water Pulse
moves.description: The user attacks the target with a pulsing blast of water. It may also confuse the target.

moves.name: Quick Attack
moves.description: The user lunges at the target at a speed that makes it almost invisible. It is sure to strike first.

moves.name: Roost
moves.description: The user lands and rests its body. It restores the user's HP by up to half of its max HP.

moves.name: Pursuit
moves.description: An attack move that inflicts double damage if used on a target that is switching out of battle.

moves.name: Air Cutter
moves.description: The user launches razor-like wind to slash the opposing team. Critical hits land more easily.

moves.name: Agility
moves.description: The user relaxes and lightens its body to move faster. It sharply boosts the Speed stat.

moves.name: Aerial Ace
moves.description: The user confounds the target with speed, then slashes. The attack lands without fail.

moves.name: Air Slash
moves.description: The user attacks with a blade of air that slices even the sky. It may also make the target flinch.

moves.name: Hurricane
moves.description: The user attacks by wrapping its opponent in a fierce wind that flies up into the sky. It may also confuse the target.

moves.name: Flare Blitz
moves.description: The user cloaks itself in fire and charges at the target. The user sustains serious damage and may leave the target burned.

moves.name: Fire Punch
moves.description: The target is punched with a fiery fist. It may also leave the target with a burn.

moves.name: High Jump Kick
moves.description: The target is attacked with a knee kick from a jump. If it misses, the user is hurt instead.

moves.name: Scratch
moves.description: Hard, pointed, and sharp claws rake the target to inflict damage.

moves.name: Growl
moves.description: The user growls in an endearing way, making the opposing team less wary. The foes' Attack stats are lowered.

moves.name: Focus Energy
moves.description: The user takes a deep breath and focuses so that critical hits land more easily.

moves.name: Ember
moves.description: The target is attacked with small flames. It may also leave the target with a burn.

moves.name: Double Kick
moves.description: The target is quickly kicked twice in succession using both feet.

moves.name: Peck
moves.description: The target is jabbed with a sharply pointed beak or horn.

moves.name: Sand Attack
moves.description: Sand is hurled in the target's face, reducing its accuracy.

moves.name: Bulk Up
moves.description: The user tenses its muscles to bulk up its body, boosting both its Attack and Defense stats.

moves.name: Quick Attack
moves.description: The user lunges at the target at a speed that makes it almost invisible. It is sure to strike first.

moves.name: Blaze Kick
moves.description: The user launches a kick that lands a critical hit more easily. It may also leave the target with a burn.

moves.name: Slash
moves.description: The target is attacked with a slash of claws or blades. Critical hits land more easily.

moves.name: Brave Bird
moves.description: The user tucks in its wings and charges from a low altitude. The user also takes serious damage.

moves.name: Sky Uppercut
moves.description: The user attacks the target with an uppercut thrown skyward with force.

moves.name: Flare Blitz
moves.description: The user cloaks itself in fire and charges at the target. The user sustains serious damage and may leave the target burned.

moves.name: Absorb
moves.description: A nutrient-draining attack. The user's HP is restored by half the damage taken by the target.

moves.name: Tackle
moves.description: A physical attack in which the user charges and slams into the target with its whole body.

moves.name: Stun Spore
moves.description: The user scatters a cloud of paralyzing powder. It may leave the target with paralysis.

moves.name: Leech Seed
moves.description: A seed is planted on the target. It steals some HP from the target every turn.

moves.name: Mega Drain
moves.description: A nutrient-draining attack. The user's HP is restored by half the damage taken by the target.

moves.name: Headbutt
moves.description: The user sticks out its head and attacks by charging straight into the target. It may also make the target flinch.

moves.name: Poison Powder
moves.description: The user scatters a cloud of poisonous dust on the target. It may poison the target.

moves.name: Worry Seed
moves.description: A seed that causes worry is planted on the target. It prevents sleep by making its Ability Insomnia.

moves.name: Growth
moves.description: The user's body grows all at once, raising the Attack and Sp. Atk stats.

moves.name: Giga Drain
moves.description: A nutrient-draining attack. The user's HP is restored by half the damage taken by the target.

moves.name: Seed Bomb
moves.description: The user slams a barrage of hard-shelled seeds down on the target from above.

moves.name: Spore
moves.description: The user scatters bursts of spores that induce sleep.

moves.name: Fake Out
moves.description: An attack that hits first and makes the target flinch. It only works the first turn the user is in battle.

moves.name: Attract
moves.description: If it is the opposite gender of the user, the target becomes infatuated and less likely to attack.

moves.name: Sing
moves.description: A soothing lullaby is sung in a calming voice that puts the target into a deep slumber.

moves.name: Double Slap
moves.description: The target is slapped repeatedly, back and forth, two to five times in a row.

moves.name: Splash
moves.description: The user just flops and splashes around to no effect at all...

moves.name: Water Gun
moves.description: The target is blasted with a forceful shot of water.

moves.name: Tail Whip
moves.description: The user wags its tail cutely, making opposing Pokémon less wary and lowering their Defense stat.

moves.name: Water Sport
moves.description: The user soaks itself with water. The move weakens Fire-type moves while the user is in the battle.

moves.name: Bubble
moves.description: A spray of countless bubbles is jetted at the opposing team. It may also lower the targets' Speed stats.

moves.name: Charm
moves.description: The user gazes at the target rather charmingly, making it less wary. The target's Attack is harshly lowered.

moves.name: Bubble Beam
moves.description: A spray of bubbles is forcefully ejected at the opposing team. It may also lower their Speed stats.

moves.name: Helping Hand
moves.description: The user assists an ally by boosting the power of its attack.

moves.name: Slam
moves.description: The target is slammed with a long tail, vines, etc., to inflict damage.

moves.name: Bounce
moves.description: The user bounces up high, then drops on the target on the second turn. It may also leave the target with paralysis.

moves.name: Air Slash
moves.description: The user attacks with a blade of air that slices even the sky. It may also make the target flinch.

moves.name: Pluck
moves.description: The user pecks the target. If the target is holding a Berry, the user eats it and gains its effect.

moves.description: The target is jabbed with a sharply pointed beak or horn.

moves.name: Growl
moves.description: The user growls in an endearing way, making the opposing team less wary. The foes' Attack stats are lowered.

moves.name: Focus Energy
moves.description: The user takes a deep breath and focuses so that critical hits land more easily.

moves.name: Wing Attack
moves.description: The target is struck with large, imposing wings spread wide to inflict damage.

moves.name: Double Team
moves.description: By moving rapidly, the user makes illusory copies of itself to raise its evasiveness.

moves.name: Endeavor
moves.description: An attack move that cuts down the target's HP to equal the user's HP.

moves.name: Aerial Ace
moves.description: The user confounds the target with speed, then slashes. The attack lands without fail.

moves.name: Agility
moves.description: The user relaxes and lightens its body to move faster. It sharply boosts the Speed stat.

moves.name: Air Slash
moves.description: The user attacks with a blade of air that slices even the sky. It may also make the target flinch.

moves.name: Pound
moves.description: The target is physically pounded with a long tail or a foreleg, etc.

moves.name: Uproar
moves.description: The user attacks in an uproar for three turns. Over that time, no one can fall asleep.

moves.name: Astonish
moves.description: The user attacks the target while shouting in a startling fashion. It may also make the target flinch.

moves.name: Howl
moves.description: The user howls loudly to raise its spirit, boosting its Attack stat.

moves.name: Supersonic
moves.description: The user generates odd sound waves from its body. It may confuse the target.

moves.name: Stomp
moves.description: The target is stomped with a big foot. It may also make the target flinch.

moves.name: Screech
moves.description: An earsplitting screech harshly reduces the target's Defense stat.

moves.name: Roar
moves.description: The target is scared off and replaced by another Pokémon in its party. In the wild, the battle ends.

moves.name: Synchronoise
moves.description: Using an odd shock wave, the user inflicts damage on any Pokémon of the same type in the area around it.

moves.name: Rest
moves.description: The user goes to sleep for two turns. It fully restores the user's HP and heals any status problem.

moves.name: Sleep Talk
moves.description: While it is asleep, the user randomly uses one of the moves it knows.

moves.name: Hyper Voice
moves.description: The user lets loose a horribly echoing shout with the power to inflict damage.

moves.name: Thunder Fang
moves.description: The user bites with electrified fangs. It may also make the target flinch or leave it with paralysis.

moves.name: Ice Fang
moves.description: The user bites with cold-infused fangs. It may also make the target flinch or leave it frozen.

moves.name: Fire Fang
moves.description: The user bites with flame-cloaked fangs. It may also make the target flinch or leave it burned.

moves.name: Bite
moves.description: The target is bitten with viciously sharp fangs. It may make the target flinch.

moves.name: Leer
moves.description: The opposing team gains an intimidating leer with sharp eyes. The opposing team's Defense stats are reduced.

moves.name: Sandstorm
moves.description: A five-turn sandstorm is summoned to hurt all combatants except the Rock, Ground, and Steel types.

moves.name: Screech
moves.description: An earsplitting screech harshly reduces the target's Defense stat.

moves.name: Chip Away
moves.description: Looking for an opening, the user strikes continually. The target's stat changes don't affect this attack's damage.

moves.name: Rock Slide
moves.description: Large boulders are hurled at the opposing team to inflict damage. It may also make the targets flinch.

moves.name: Scary Face
moves.description: The user frightens the target with a scary face to harshly reduce its Speed stat.

moves.name: Thrash
moves.description: The user rampages and attacks for two to three turns. It then becomes confused, however.

moves.name: Dark Pulse
moves.description: The user releases a horrible aura imbued with dark thoughts. It may also make the target flinch.

moves.name: Payback
moves.description: If the user moves after the target, this attack's power will be doubled.

moves.name: Crunch
moves.description: The user crunches up the target with sharp fangs. It may also lower the target's Defense stat.

moves.name: Earthquake
moves.description: The user sets off an earthquake that strikes those around it.

moves.name: Stone Edge
moves.description: The user stabs the foe with sharpened stones from below. It has a high critical-hit ratio.

moves.name: Hyper Beam
moves.description: The target is attacked with a powerful beam. The user must rest on the next turn to regain its energy.

moves.name: Giga Impact

moves.name: Spite
moves.description: The user unleashes its grudge on the move last used by the target by cutting 4 PP from it.

moves.name: Confuse Ray
moves.description: The target is exposed to a sinister ray that triggers confusion.

moves.name: Shadow Sneak
moves.description: The user extends its shadow and attacks the target from behind. This move always goes first.

moves.name: Grudge
moves.description: If the user faints, the user's grudge fully depletes the PP of the opponent's move that knocked it out.

moves.name: Phantom Force
moves.description: The user vanishes somewhere, then strikes the target on the next turn. This move hits even if the target protects itself.

moves.name: Heal Block
moves.description: For five turns, the user prevents the opposing team from using any moves, Abilities, or held items that recover HP.

moves.name: Shadow Ball
moves.description: The user hurls a shadowy blob at the target. It may also lower the target's Sp. Def stat.

moves.name: Growl
moves.description: The user growls in an endearing way, making the opposing team less wary. The foes' Attack stats are lowered.

moves.name: Confusion
moves.description: The target is hit by a weak telekinetic force. It may also leave the target confused.

moves.name: Double Team
moves.description: By moving rapidly, the user makes illusory copies of itself to raise its evasiveness.

moves.name: Teleport
moves.description: Use it to flee from any wild Pokémon. It can also warp to the last Pokémon Center visited.

moves.name: Lucky Chant
moves.description: The user chants an incantation toward the sky, preventing opposing Pokémon from landing critical hits.

moves.name: Magical Leaf

moves.name: Sheer Cold
moves.description: The target is attacked with a blast of absolute-zero cold. The target instantly faints if it hits.

moves.name: Rock Climb
moves.description: The user attacks the target by smashing into it with incredible force. It may also confuse the target.

moves.name: Tackle
moves.description: A physical attack in which the user charges and slams into the target with its whole body.

moves.name: Harden
moves.description: The user stiffens all the muscles in its body to raise its Defense stat.

moves.name: Rollout
moves.description: The user continually rolls into the target over five turns. It becomes stronger each time it hits.

moves.name: Curse
moves.description: A move that works differently for the Ghost type than for all other types.

moves.name: Rollout
moves.description: The user continually rolls into the target over five turns. It becomes stronger each time it hits.

moves.name: Curse
moves.description: A move that works differently for the Ghost type than for all other types.

moves.name: Metal Claw
moves.description: The target is raked with steel claws. It may also raise the user's Attack stat.

moves.name: Pin Missile
moves.description: Sharp spikes are shot at the target in rapid succession. They hit two to five times in a row.

moves.name: Gyro Ball
moves.description: The user tackles the target with a high-speed spin. The slower the user, the greater the damage.

moves.name: Iron Defense
moves.description: The user hardens its body's surface like iron, sharply raising its Defense stat.

moves.name: Mirror Shot
moves.description: The user looses a flash of energy at the target from its polished body. It may also lower the target's accuracy.

moves.name: Ingrain
moves.description: The user lays roots that restore its HP on every turn. Because it is rooted, it can't switch out.

moves.name: Self-Destruct
moves.description: The user attacks everything around it by causing an explosion. The user faints upon using this move.

moves.name: Power Whip
moves.description: The user violently whirls its vines or tentacles to harshly lash the target.

moves.name: Iron Head
moves.description: The user slams the target with its steel-hard head. It may also make the target flinch.

moves.name: Payback
moves.description: If the user moves after the target, this attack's power will be doubled.

moves.name: Flash Cannon
moves.description: The user gathers all its light energy and releases it at once. It may also lower the target's Sp. Def stat.

moves.name: Explosion
moves.description: The user explodes to inflict damage on those around it. The user faints upon using this move.

moves.name: Growl
moves.description: The user growls in an endearing way, making the opposing team less wary. The foes' Attack stats are lowered.

moves.name: Powder Snow
moves.description: The user attacks with a chilling gust of powdery snow. It may also freeze the targets.

moves.name: Bide
moves.description: The user endures attacks for two turns, then strikes back to cause double the damage taken.

moves.name: Icy Wind
moves.description: The user attacks with a gust of chilled air. It also reduces the targets' Speed stat.

moves.name: Play Nice
moves.description: The user and the target become friends, and the target loses its will to fight. This lowers the target's Attack stat.

moves.name: Fury Swipes
moves.description: The target is raked with sharp claws or scythes for two to five times in quick succession.

moves.name: Brine
moves.description: If the target's HP is down to about half, this attack will hit with double the power.

moves.name: Endure
moves.description: The user endures any attack with at least 1 HP. Its chance of failing rises if it is used in succession.

moves.name: Charm
moves.description: The user gazes at the target rather charmingly, making it less wary. The target's Attack is harshly lowered.

moves.name: Slash
moves.description: The target is attacked with a slash of claws or blades. Critical hits land more easily.

moves.name: Flail
moves.description: The user flails about aimlessly to attack. It becomes more powerful the less HP the user has.

moves.name: Rest
moves.description: The user goes to sleep for two turns. It fully restores the user's HP and heals any status problem.

moves.name: Hail
moves.description: The user summons a hailstorm lasting five turns. It damages all Pokémon except the Ice type.

moves.name: Thrash
moves.description: The user rampages and attacks for two to three turns. It then becomes confused, however.

moves.name: Pound

moves.name: Astonish
moves.description: The user attacks the target while shouting in a startling fashion. It may also make the target flinch.

moves.name: Mud-Slap
moves.description: The user hurls mud in the target's face to inflict damage and lower its accuracy.

moves.name: Rollout

moves.name: Curse

moves.name: Earthquake
moves.description: The user sets off an earthquake that strikes those around it.

moves.description: The user swings and hits with its strong and heavy fist. It lowers the user's Speed, however.

moves.name: Focus Punch
moves.description: The user focuses its mind before launching a punch. It will fail if the user is hit before it is used.

moves.name: Hydro Pump
moves.description: The target is blasted by a huge volume of water launched under great pressure.

moves.description: The user and its allies are protected from wide-ranging attacks for one turn. If used in succession, its chance of failing rises.

moves.description: The user faints. In return, the Pokémon taking its place will have its HP restored and status cured.

moves.name: Aqua Jet

moves.name: Double Slap

moves.name: Force Palm
moves.description: The target is attacked with a shock wave. It may also leave the target with paralysis.

moves.description: After making its attack, the user rushes back to switch places with a party Pokémon in waiting.

moves.description: The user protects itself and its allies from priority moves. If used in succession, its chance of failing rises.

moves.name: Water Pulse
moves.description: The user attacks the target with a pulsing blast of water. It may also confuse the target.

moves.name: Smokescreen
moves.description: The user releases an obscuring cloud of smoke or ink. It reduces the target's accuracy.

moves.name: Round
moves.description: The user attacks the target with a song. Others can join in the Round and make the attack do greater damage.

moves.name: Fling
moves.description: The user flings its held item at the target to attack. Its power and effects depend on the item.

moves.name: Smack Down
moves.description: The user throws a stone or projectile to attack an opponent. A flying Pokémon will fall to the ground when hit.

moves.name: Substitute
moves.description: The user makes a copy of itself using some of its HP. The copy serves as the user's decoy.

moves.name: Bounce
moves.description: The user bounces up high, then drops on the target on the second turn. It may also leave the target with paralysis.

moves.name: Double Team
moves.description: By moving rapidly, the user makes illusory copies of itself to raise its evasiveness.

moves.name: Hydro Pump
moves.description: The target is blasted by a huge volume of water launched under great pressure.

moves.name: Tackle
moves.description: A physical attack in which the user charges and slams into the target with its whole body.

moves.name: Growl
moves.description: The user growls in an endearing way, making the opposing team less wary. The foes' Attack stats are lowered.

moves.name: Quick Attack
moves.description: The user lunges at the target at a speed that makes it almost invisible. It is sure to strike first.

moves.name: Peck
moves.description: The target is jabbed with a sharply pointed beak or horn.

moves.name: Agility
moves.description: The user relaxes and lightens its body to move faster. It sharply boosts the Speed stat.

moves.name: Flail
moves.description: The user flails about aimlessly to attack. It becomes more powerful the less HP the user has.

moves.name: Ember
moves.description: The target is attacked with small flames. It may also leave the target with a burn.

moves.name: Roost
moves.description: The user lands and rests its body. It restores the user's HP by up to half of its max HP.

moves.name: Razor Wind
moves.description: A two-turn attack. Blades of wind hit opposing Pokémon on the second turn. Critical hits land more easily.

moves.name: Night Slash
moves.description: The user slashes the target the instant an opportunity arises. Critical hits land more easily.

moves.name: Role Play
moves.description: The user mimics the target completely, copying the target's natural Ability.

moves.name: Mat Block
moves.description: Using a pulled-up mat as a shield, the user protects itself and its allies from damaging moves. This does not stop status moves.

moves.name: Pound
moves.description: The target is physically pounded with a long tail or a foreleg, etc.

moves.name: Growl
moves.description: The user growls in an endearing way, making the opposing team less wary. The foes' Attack stats are lowered.

moves.name: Bubble
moves.description: A spray of countless bubbles is jetted at the opposing team. It may also lower the targets' Speed stats.

moves.name: Quick Attack
moves.description: The user lunges at the target at a speed that makes it almost invisible. It is sure to strike first.

moves.name: Lick

moves.name: Substitute

moves.name: Double Team

moves.name: Haze
